comments: Professor Morgan is a nice enough person, but she is not an effective educator. This class was absurdly difficult, and yet no significant instruction was provided. Professor Morgan was absent for days and rarely contributed meaningful information. Her quizzes are tough, although she\'ll boost your grade if you write with objections. Bad experience.

Easy homework/discussion board assignments, but tough quizes. There is a quiz every week, but it is not timed which helps a lot. A reasonable work load. Little to no involvement by the professor. An okay class to take if you do plan to major in economics.
I took her online and thought she was pretty easy. As long as the discussion boards are done every week, you will get a good grade. The quizzes are pretty difficult, but she usually curves them.
